      • cleanTagPerservingLineBreaks

        public static java.lang.String cleanTagPerservingLineBreaks(java.lang.String html)
        Clean HTML tags while preserving the line breaks 1. if the original html contains newline(\n), it gets preserved 2. if the original html contains br or p tags, they gets translated to newline(\n).
        Parameters:

        Returns:
